ComicInfo.Title: Invasion of the Bettie Snatchers Chapter Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
The ultimate conspiracy against America has gone deeper than anyone could have possible imagined. Is there anyone who can uncover the truth in time? Is the end in sight? Is there anyone that can save us? Model Agent Bettie Page is reporting for duty!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | John Royle (a) & Sebastian Cheng (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Scott Chantler | 2 | C | Cover C | Anthony Marques (a), J. Bone (i) & Luis Antonio Delgado | 3 | D | Cover D | Pasquale Qualano | 4 | E | Cover E | Photo | 5 | F/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Photo" Edition Variant Cover | Photo | 6 | G/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Anthony Marques (a), J. Bone (i) & Luis Antonio Delgado | 7 | H/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Scott Chantler | 8 | I/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Pasquale Qualano | 9 | J/FOC | 1:11 FOC "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Pasquale Qualano | 10 | K/FOC | 1:15 FOC "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Royle | 11 | L/FOC | 1:21 FOC "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | John Royle (a) & Sebastian Cheng (c) | 12 | M/FOC | 1:25 FOC "Black & White Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | John Royle | 13 | Note: Cover B and the 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover are a homage of the movie poster for Attack of the 50ft. Woman.
